training_briefs.brief: Write a tagline for a new premium electric vehicle that emphasizes sustainability and luxury.
Create a tagline for a fitness app that focuses on personalized workouts and mental wellbeing.
Develop a tagline for a plant-based food brand that highlights taste and environmental benefits.
Write a tagline for a travel booking platform that specializes in sustainable tourism.
Create a tagline for a new streaming service that focuses on independent films and documentaries.
Develop a tagline for a smart home security system that emphasizes ease of use and peace of mind.
Write a tagline for a premium coffee subscription service that delivers globally sourced beans.
Create a tagline for a skincare brand that uses only natural, ethically sourced ingredients.
Develop a tagline for a financial app that helps young people save and invest money.
Write a tagline for a new co-working space designed for creative professionals.
Create a tagline for an online education platform specializing in creative skills.
Develop a tagline for an energy drink targeting professionals who need sustained focus.

evaluation_briefs.brief: Write a tagline for a sustainable fashion brand that uses recycled materials.
Create a tagline for a premium headphone brand focusing on immersive sound quality.
Develop a tagline for a meal kit delivery service emphasizing fresh, local ingredients.
Write a tagline for a virtual reality gaming platform that promises new worlds to explore.
Create a tagline for a productivity app that helps users manage their time better.
